#UNFCCC check things

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
unfccc <- read_csv("C:/Users/laura/OneDrive/Documenti/LAURA/MCC/futurelab_ceres/policy_databases/unfccc_final.csv")
```

```{r}

for (i in unfccc$`Policy Name`){grepl("\n", i)}

```


```{r}

for (i in unfccc$`Policy Description`){str_replace(i, "\\n", " ")}


```
